back_log.default: -1(signifies autosizing; do not assign this literal value)

dragnet.log_error_filter_rules.default: IF prio>=INFORMATION THEN drop. IF EXISTS source_line THEN unset source_line.

host_cache_size.default: -1(signifies autosizing; do not assign this literal value)

table_definition_cache.default: -1(signifies autosizing; do not assign this literal value)

temptable_max_ram.default: 3% of total memory: min 1 GB, max 4 GB

innodb_open_files.default: -1(signifies autosizing; do not assign this literal value)

innodb_purge_threads.default: 1 if # of available logical processors is <= 16; otherwise 4
